channel.title: Keyboard + mouse does't work?
channel.description: whenever im in a server (including localhost), it really lags (which i know is a problem to everyone) and my wireless keyboard/mouse becomes almost unresponsive. But whenever i exit a server, it works normally. Is there anything that can clarify this problem? or is it unresolvable like lag?

item.title: Keyboard + mouse does't work?
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

Yeah, that happend with my sisters PC,
I’m not really sure why either, It was fairly new…

Read full topic

item.title: Keyboard + mouse does't work?

@run wrote:

its just lag, must be your computer, how old is it?
